subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks (4-14), one of the worst teams in the league, thoroughly outplayed the Suns (14-4), who arrived with the N.B.A.’s best record.
snippet: The Knicks (4-14), one of the worst teams in the league, thoroughly outplayed the Suns (14-4), who arrived with the N.B.A.’s best record.
